data.system_settings: Zorin OS, based off of Ubuntu 16.04
data.actual_result: It allows you to use the mention button, but the text box stays the same with the no perms message, and the channel appears in quick switcher under drafts
data.expected_result: It shouldn't allow you to be able to use the mention button since you don't have permission to actually send messages
data.short_description: If you click the "mention" button on a dead invite in a channel you don't have perms to type in, you'll have a draft in quick switcher
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a channel that you don't have perms to speak in, which contains a dead invite - Click the "mention" button on the dead invite (you must have the new invites for this) - Go to two other channels (to clear last channel) - Click control + k and observe
